snippet: In a wide-ranging speech at the University of Pennsylvania Law School, Daniel K. Tarullo, of the Fed's board of governors, said Congress could set limits to ensure that institutions aren't "too big to fail."

headline.main: Fed Governor Suggests Congress Weigh Laws to Limit Bank Size
